name: High School Gangster Squad
description:
You have recently enrolled in High school and you want to take part in bully boy teasing activities. Give hard time to the high school management by doing teasing activities in the school. Snatch food and bags from your class mates. Steal Papers from your principle office.
Make fun of your friends and live a bully boy life in high school games.

Features for High School Ganster
- City High School Revenge Features
- Interesting Game Play & Missions
- Amazing 3D City High School Environment
- Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics
- Thrilling and Challenging Missions

Easy and fun to play
